entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along the coast.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 10 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 7 along the coast.
